definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: plumage (cf. poss. Ar. na0s.iyah;un hair over forehead, fore-lock of horse, Lane:3033; v. also As. na-aṣ kappe);—of eagle ´[[מָלֵא הַגּ]] Ez Eze 17:3 (fig. of Nebuch.; + [[כָּנׇף]], [[אֵבֶר]]); also ´[[רַב נ]] v:Eze 17:7 (fig. of kg. of Egypt; + [[כָּנׇף]]); of ostrich [[נׁחָה]] Job 39:13 (‖[[כנף]], + [[אֶבְרָה]]; cf. Di Bu). Here belongs prob. also [[בְּנׁחָתָהּ]] Le 1:16, rd. [[בְּנׁחָתׂה]] (Dr-Wh:Hpt), [[בנחתו]] (Sam), or [[נׁחָתוֹ]] ([[אֶת־]])[[וְ]] (cf. Di), its feathers, of bird for burnt-offering; LXX su\n toi=v pteroi=v, Vulgate et plumas; so AV RVm; > with its filth (i.e. of the crop) Targum Onk SyrVer Ges Kn Ke Kal Ew RV, meaning without evidence elsewhere.
